backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining types (Book, JournalEntry, UserProfile, MeditationSession, ProgressStats, Ritual, etc.) and importing core libraries, access control, and blob storage mixins for a meditation app backend.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the completed feature to move the meditation guide container to the bottom of PreMeditationPage with centered 'More details' button.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files including pages, components, hooks, and configuration files with detailed descriptions of their functionality and recent changes.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RUNBOOK.md: Step-by-step deployment instructions for redeploying the Inner Bloom meditation app without code changes, including prerequisites and clean build environment steps.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Structured troubleshooting template for diagnosing deployment failures across dependency installation, backend/frontend deployment, Candid generation, build, and runtime stages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH color system using space-separated channel values for light/dark themes, custom colors, Playfair Display font, animations, scrollbar styling, and themed button styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with favicon, early-runtime process.env compatibility shim, and global error handlers to capture deployment/runtime failures for post-deploy validation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component configuring TanStack Router with seven routes (landing, dashboard, pre-meditation, progress, journal, books, knowledge) wrapped in error boundary, theme provider, and toaster.
frontend/src/components/AmbientMusicCaro: Carousel component for selecting ambient sounds with previous/next navigation, touch swipe support, volume control slider, mute toggle, and audio playback management starting from track midpoint.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary component that catches and displays application errors with detailed error message, stack trace, component stack, and reload button in a styled alert interface.
frontend/src/components/CloudSyncErrorBa: Displays an error banner with customizable messages for different error types (authorization, readiness, network, other) and includes a retry button with loading state.
frontend/src/components/DurationRangeInp: A slider component for selecting meditation/activity duration in minutes with configurable min/max values and 5-minute step increments.
frontend/src/components/FloatingNav.tsx: A fixed left-side navigation menu with animated floating buttons for Journal, Progress, Books, and Knowledge sections, showing labels on hover.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Mobile hamburger menu (Sheet component) providing theme toggle, account status display, and logout functionality with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/JournalFiltersDr: A comprehensive filter UI for journal entries with dropdowns for moods, energy levels, date ranges, favorites toggle, and text search with active filter count badge.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeBookPag: A paginated book reader with keyboard/touch navigation, smooth scrolling to content on page change, and animated page transitions.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeCategor: A circular carousel for knowledge categories with touch/keyboard navigation, showing center item at full scale with adjacent items partially visible at reduced opacity.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeQuizDia: A dialog component for displaying and managing interactive quizzes with multiple-choice questions, progress tracking, navigation between questions, and result display with retake functionality.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusM: A Three.js/React Three Fiber 3D lotus flower model with animated petals, stem, and center glow that responds to growth state parameters including breathing, bloom openness, and vividness with theme-aware colors.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusP: A Three.js particle system that orbits the lotus model, transitioning between chaotic Brownian motion and coherent orbital patterns based on growth state and particle coherence parameters.
frontend/src/components/LotusCanvas.tsx: An animated canvas component that renders a lotus flower with breathing petals and floating particles, supporting multiple variants (default, enhanced, premed) with theme-aware visibility adjustments.
frontend/src/components/MeditationCarous: A carousel component for selecting meditation types (mindfulness, metta, visualization, IFS, quiz) with touch swipe support and circular navigation between cards.
frontend/src/components/MeditationGuideS: A stepper component that displays meditation guide steps with navigation controls, dot indicators, touch swipe support, and special formatting for benefits sections.
frontend/src/components/MeditationTimerR: An animated canvas component that renders a circular progress ring with wave effects and glowing edges, theme-aware styling, and smooth animation for meditation timer visualization.
frontend/src/components/MeditationWaveFi: Canvas-based animated wave fill indicator that displays meditation progress (0-1) with a circular clipping region, animated wave surface, and theme-aware colors.
frontend/src/components/MobileBackButton: Mobile-only back button component that navigates to dashboard, conditionally rendered with optional custom onBack handler.
frontend/src/components/PageBackgroundSh: Layout wrapper component that renders children with a LotusCanvas background, supporting variant and intensity props.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBowl.tsx: Canvas-based animated bowl visualization that fills with liquid based on total meditation minutes (capped at 20,000), featuring wave animation and theme-aware glow effects.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusR3F: React Three Fiber 3D lotus visualization that renders a growing lotus model with particles based on total meditation minutes and theme.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusSVG: SVG-based lotus flower visualization with multiple petal layers that grow, open, and glow based on meditation minutes and streak, featuring breathing animation and theme-aware colors.
frontend/src/components/QuizDialog.tsx: Multi-step quiz dialog with 5 questions that recommends a meditation type (mindfulness, metta, visualization, or IFS) based on user responses.
frontend/src/components/RitualSelectionM: Modal dialog displaying up to 5 saved meditation rituals in a carousel, allowing users to start or delete rituals.
frontend/src/components/SavedRitualsCaro: A carousel component for displaying and managing saved meditation rituals with swipe/navigation controls, delete confirmation dialog, and visual cards showing meditation type, duration, ambient sound, and volume settings.
frontend/src/components/SessionIndicator: Displays user authentication status in the top-left corner, showing either 'Exploring as Guest' with a return-to-start button or 'Logged In' with a logout button that clears queries and navigates home.
Provides standard page navigation with desktop/mobile layouts including session indicator, theme toggle, back button, and hamburger menu components.
frontend/src/components/ThemedToaster.ts: A simple wrapper component that renders the Sonner toast notification system with a close button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance, handling both authenticated and anonymous modes, initializing access control, and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCloudOperation.ts: Composition hook that wraps cloud operations with automatic readiness-aware retry logic, using refs to access current actor and identity without causing re-renders.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMeditationTimer.ts: Custom React hook that manages meditation timer state with play/pause, progress tracking, time seeking, duration adjustment, and completion callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend data operations (books, quotes, journal entries, meditation sessions, progress stats, rituals) with guest mode fallback to local storage and cloud sync error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind imports, OKLCH color system for light/dark themes, custom animations (fade-in, breathe, glow-pulse, float, wave), and Playfair Display font configuration.
frontend/src/lib/bookData.ts: Static data array of meditation book recommendations with titles, authors, descriptions, Amazon links, tags, and icons.
frontend/src/lib/knowledgeContent.ts: Defines structured educational content for meditation techniques (mindfulness, etc.) with multi-page lessons and quiz questions for the knowledge base feature.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
Page component for active meditation sessions (content truncated in provided input).
frontend/src/pages/BookRecommendationsPa: Displays a carousel of book recommendations with touch/swipe navigation, theme toggle, and session indicator. Fetches book data from BOOK_RECOMMENDATIONS and renders cards with scaling/opacity transitions for a 3D carousel effect.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page showing meditation carousel, daily quotes, and ritual management. Handles meditation type selection, quiz dialog, ritual modal, and navigation to pre-meditation with optional auto-start for saved rituals.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Journal entries page with filtering (favorites, mood, energy, date, text), inline editing, delete confirmation, and import/export functionality. Supports both authenticated cloud sync and guest mode with local storage.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgePage.tsx: Knowledge library page displaying meditation technique content via category carousel and book pager. Includes quiz dialog for testing understanding and tracks quiz scores per category with optional deep-link scrolling to content.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with Internet Identity login, guest mode option, and theme toggle. Auto-redirects authenticated users to dashboard and displays animated lotus canvas background with hero content.
frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: Main pre-meditation setup page with meditation type selection, duration slider, ambient sound carousel, mood/energy state inputs, optional journal entry, and ritual saving. Integrates timer hook, backend mutations for recording sessions and journal entries, and displays detailed meditation guides with step-by-step instructions.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Progress tracking page displaying user meditation stats (total minutes, streak, rank) in a visual bowl component. Includes export/import functionality for backing up and restoring progress data with confirmation dialogs and cloud sync error handling.
frontend/src/utils/ambientSounds.ts: Defines ambient sound data structure and provides a centralized list of available sounds (temple bells, singing bowl, rain, ocean, etc.) with helper functions to retrieve sound metadata and audio paths by ID.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSync.ts: Provides standardized cloud sync error handling with predefined error codes and user-friendly messages. Maps backend errors (actor not ready, unauthorized, network issues, duplicate rituals, etc.) to appropriate user messages for consistent error display.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSyncRetry.ts: Implements retry logic for cloud operations with automatic waiting for actor/identity readiness. Distinguishes between retryable readiness errors and non-retryable authorization errors to prevent unnecessary retry attempts.
frontend/src/utils/exportImport.ts: Handles serialization and deserialization of meditation data for export/import functionality. Converts backend types (with bigints and Principals) to safe JSON format and validates/normalizes meditation types, mood states, and energy states during import.
Manages local storage of knowledge quiz scores per user (or guest), storing category-specific scores with timestamps. Provides hooks to retrieve and save quiz progress tied to user principal IDs.
frontend/src/utils/lotusGrowthModel.ts: Defines the lotus growth model that maps meditation minutes (0-20,000) to visual parameters across 25 exponential phases, controlling petal layers, openness, glow, particles, and breathing effects.
frontend/src/utils/meditationStorage.ts: Provides localStorage utilities for guest-only meditation data (journal entries, progress, rituals) with legacy data migration from non-prefixed keys.
frontend/src/utils/meditationType.ts: Validates and coerces meditation type strings to the MeditationType enum, handling aliases like 'meta' for 'metta' and defaulting to mindfulness.
frontend/src/utils/progressRanks.ts: Defines rank tiers (Droplet to Infinite Waters) based on total meditation minutes (0-20,000+) with utilities to get current rank, next rank, and minutes until next tier.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for extracting URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and cleanup functions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom colors using OKLCH color space, theme extensions for borders/shadows/animations, and container/typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking meditation app features and pending requests for UI refinements including meditation guide repositioning, audio controls, and theme-aware styling.
